attributes.contentHtml:
Juicy Other guy was me, he accused me of nuking his nodes.. When literally his manager RusJS is saying that its him that nuked his OWN nodes..

Also he probably told my developer (Hexagon) some things that i didnt do at all..

Now claiming i stole Juicy, first of all... You cant steal a person online lol? Second of all, Juicy left AltHost because of the shit that is going on, me and Juicy literally got BANNED for nothing by bad. And then me and Juicy decided to leave Alt and start our own host.

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer
